texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, there are changes and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Travel on TfL public transport will be free from 23:45 on New Year's Eve until 04:30 on New Year's Day.
For travel after 04:30 tomorrow, see our New Year's Day page .

You must have a ticket for the Mayor of London's New Year's Eve fireworks event in central London. If you do not have a ticket, there are plenty of other places to celebrate the New Year. For more information (including what you can bring to the event) visit www.london.gov.uk/nye
There are changes and planned works on the following services today. All our other services are running normally.
See our Status updates map for Monday 31 December for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
We are running a special all-night service on most lines:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No Piccadilly line service between Rayners Lane and Uxbridge","First trains will be at weekday times","On most lines, trains will run every 2-8 minutes in central London and every 5-15 minutes in outer areas and on branches until 04:30 on New Year's Day","The Waterloo \u0026 City line will run every 3-10 minutes until about 02:30","Services are not as frequent on some sections of the Central, Circle, Hammersmith \u0026 City, Metropolitan and Piccadilly lines. \u003ca href=\"/plan-a-journey/index\"\u003eCheck your journey\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tube stations"}
The following Tube stations will be closed or exit-only:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Blackfriars station - between 23:30 until 04:30, open for Tube services only (National Rail trains will not stop)","Chalk Farm - closed from 22:00","Charing Cross - closed from 19:00","Covent Garden - exit only from 19:00","Embankment - closed from 23:30 until 00:15","Lambeth North - closed from 23:30","Leicester Square - exit only from 20:00, closed from 23:30","Piccadilly Circus - closed from 23:30","Southwark - exit only from 23:45","St Paul's - exit only from 23:45","Westminster - interchange only from 21:30"]}
For travel after 04:30 please check our New Year's Day page.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A weekday service is running:ul","A Saturday service is runing:ul","No service between South Tottenham and Barking","No service between Romford and Upminster","No service between Edmonton Green and Cheshunt","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Chingford (trains about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Hackney Downs and Clapton)","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Edmonton Green / Enfield Town (trains about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields and Hackney Downs)","Special all-night service between Highbury \u0026 Islington and New Cross Gate (trains run about every 15 minutes)","Special service between Willesden Junction and Stratford (trains run about 15 minutes until 02:30)","Special service between Liverpool Street and Enfield Town (not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields or Hackney Downs) every 30 minutes until 02:30","Use replacement or local buses - check \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-31T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-31T23%3a59%3a59#line-raillo-overground\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e"]}
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are changes to services today:
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Liverpool Street-Shenfield"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Liverpool Street and Romford","Trains run about every 15 minutes between Romford and Shenfield all day and overnight"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-31T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-31T23%3a59%3a59#line-raillo-overground\"\u003eReplacement buses\u003c/a\u003e run between Stratford and Romford about every 10-15 minutes, except between 00:00 (midnight) and 05:30 when buses run about every 30 minutes"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Paddington-Heathrow Terminal 4"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Trains will not stop at Heathrow Terminal 4 after midnight","Trains run between Paddington and Hayes \u0026 Harlington, not stopping at Acton Main Line, about every 30 minutes until 00:30, then about every 30 minutes until 04:30 when a normal weekday service runs"]}
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We are running a special all-night service","Trains run every 15 minutes on all routes from 00:30 until 08:00"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Trams"}
We are running a Saturday service today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There is a special all-night service every 30 minutes between Wimbledon and Beckenham Junction / New Addington","This runs until Sunday first tram times on \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/new-year-s-day-2019\"\u003eNew Year's Day\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TramsLondon for news and service information
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A Saturday service is running until 14:00, with changes for New Year's Eve celebrations","An enhanced Saturday service is running on route 507","A limited service is running on normal Monday to Friday only routes 521 and X68"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Buses after 14:00"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["From 14:00, bus routes in central London will be diverted or stop short of their final destination in preparation for the ticketed fireworks celebration","If you are not attending the fireworks event, begin your bus journey before 14:00, if you can, to avoid delays"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Buses after 19:30"}
From 19:30, buses will operate from hub locations:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Elephant \u0026 Castle - for south-east, south-west and south London","Holborn - for east and north-east London","Oxford Circus - for east, west and north-west London","Tottenham Court Road - for north and north-east London","Green Park - for west and south-west London","Victoria - for south, south-west and north-west London"]}
These services are running all night:
Part of route: 45, 174, 185, 388
Most bus services are expected to return to normal by 06:00 except those affected by the New Year's Day parade.
See all today's planned bus changes on our Bus status updates map for Monday 31 December .
Follow @TfLBusAlerts for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Some sections of the East - West Cycle Superhighway (CS3) and the North - South Cycle Superhighway (CS6) will be affected by road closures for the New Year's Eve celebrations","Check for \u003ca \u003e planned works and closures on roads on 31 December\u003c/a\u003e ","Some docking stations will be out of use at times","To find a docking station, visit \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003etfl.gov.uk/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\u003c/a\u003e or use the Santander Cycles App"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e and T-Charge do not apply today","From 14:00 there will be road closures  around Victoria Embankment, Westminster Bridge, Whitehall and St. James's Park. There will be further closures from 17:00 on Waterloo Bridge and the South Bank","Most roads should reopen by 06:00 or as soon as it is safe to do so, except those affected by the New Year's Day Parade","See our \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?dateTypeSelect=Future%20date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-31T00%3A00%3A00\u0026endDate=2018-12-31T23%3A59%3A59\"\u003etraffic status updates map for 31 December\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews for news and traffic information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxis \u0026 minicabs"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["There is an extra charge of £4 if you are travelling from 20:00 tonight until 06:00 on Wednesday 2 January. For private hire (including minicabs) there may be an extra charge - check when you book","Some taxi and minicab journeys may take longer because of road closures for the fireworks display in central London. Allow plenty of time for your journey."]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"River"}
Services will finish early from 21:00. The last stop at London Eye Pier will be at 15:19 to enable preparations for the fireworks. Services will stop calling at other piers from 18:45.
Follow @TfLRiver for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about service changes and planned works over the festive season.

links.title: August Bank Holiday & Notting Hill Carnival
Improvements between Acton and Wood Lane
